old:
王家の方々のお役に立てるなら
――何でもします
column2: If I can be of service to the royal family, I will do anything.
speaker: Liberation Army Soldier

old:
一人の力は小さくとも
みなが力を合わせれば――！
column2: Even though one's power may be small, if everyone combines their strength――!
speaker: Liberation Army Soldier

column2: I'm not good at small talk---
speaker: Liberation Army Soldier
